Description: An identifier for a row in the Kingfisher Process ``release``, ``record`` or ``compiled_release`` table

Either "release", "record", "compiled_release" or "embedded_release". If "release", the data was read from the ``release`` table. If "record", the data was read from a record's ``compiledRelease`` field in the ``record`` table. If "compiled_release", the data was read from the ``compiled_release`` table. If "embedded_releases", the data was read from a record's ``releases`` array in the ``record`` table.
``id`` of the row in the Kingfisher Process ``release``, ``record`` or ``compiled_release`` table
``id`` from the Kingfisher Process ``collection`` table
Value of the ``ocid`` field in the release object
Value of the ``id`` field in the release object (``NULL`` if the ``release_type`` is "record" or "compiled_release")
``id`` of the row in the Kingfisher Process ``data`` table
``id`` from the Kingfisher Process ``package_data`` table
Value of the ``version`` field in the package
Value of the ``date`` field in the release object
Value of the ``tag`` array in the release object
Value of the ``language`` field in the release object
JSONB object with the keys as unique ``roles`` and the values as count of the appearances of those `roles`
Total amount of roles specified across all parties
Length of the ``parties`` array
Length of the ``planning/documents`` array
Count of planning document types
Length of the ``tender/documents`` array
Count of tender document types
Length of the ``awards`` array
Earliest ``date`` across all award objects
Latest ``date`` across all award objects
Cumulative length of all ``awards/documents`` arrays
Cumulative length of all ``awards/items`` arrays
Cumulative length of all ``awards/suppliers`` arrays
Total of all value/amount across awards. NOTE: This ignores the fact that amounts could be of different currencies and sums them anyway
A count of distinct suppliers for all awards for this release, based on the ``unique_identifier_attempt`` field
JSONB object with the keys as unique awards/documents/documentType and the values as count of the appearances of those documentTypes
Length of the ``contracts`` array
Count of all contracts that have link to awards through awardID field
Total of all value/amount across contracts. NOTE: This ignores the fact that amounts could be of different currencies and sums them anyway
First ``dateSigned`` across all contracts
Last ``dateSigned`` across all contracts
Cumulative length of all ``contracts/documents`` arrays
Cumulative length of all ``contracts/milestones`` arrays
Cumulative length of all ``contracts/items`` arrays
Cumulative length of all ``contracts/implementation/documents`` arrays
Cumulative length of all ``contracts/implementation/milestones`` arrays
JSONB object with the keys as unique contracts/documents/documentType and the values as count of the appearances of those documentTypes
JSONB object with the keys as unique contracts/implementation/documents/documentType and the values as count of the appearances of those documentTypes
JSONB object with the keys as unique contracts/milestone/milestoneType and the values as count of the appearances of those milestoneTypes
JSONB object with the keys as unique contracts/implementation/documents/milestoneType and the values as count of the appearances of those milestoneTypes
JSONB object with the keys as unique documentTypes from all documents in the release and the values as count of the appearances of those documentTypes
Cumulative length of all document arrays
JSONB object with the keys as unique milestoneTypes from all milestones in the release and the values as count of the appearances of those milestoneTypes
Cumulative length of all milestone arrays
``source_id`` from the Kingfisher Process ``collection`` table

``data`` from the Kingfisher Process ``data`` table. This is the whole release in JSONB
``data`` from the Kingfisher Process ``package_data`` table. This is the package data in either a release or record package. For compiled releases generated by Kingfisher Process this is NULL
